dict.string: MineField.png
This is the minefield from the previous war. If you fail puzzle on it, your robot will recieve 2 damage
swamp.png
This is the rare swamp in this desert. There is a very high metal corrosion in this area. If you faiil puzzle in swamp, you robot will loose 1 attack point. If attack < 0, robot will die.
gorge.png
This is a gorge. There are lots of it in burned land. If you fail puzzle at gorge, your robot will die.
barricades.png
This is the barricades built from ancient buildings. If you cant pass barricades, your robot will return to previous location.
weaponary1.png
This is a weponary. Lots of sweet ammo for all purpose! If you own weaponary, it will grant +1 attack to all robots.
coalWarehouse1.png
This is an antenna. It will help you control more robots same time. Atenna grants you additional move point per turn.
repairer1.png
This is the repairing facility. Looks like like ancient human service center. The repairer will heal your units by 1 each turn.
sheild1.png
This is the sheild generator built for protection from meteor rain. Sheild will grant your units +1 health.
factory1.png
This is a factory. You can build additional soldiers here or upgrade existing.
base1.png
This is your main command center, commander. Dont let enemies catch it. Your personal protector is guarding base from uninvited guests.
